name: Zero Gravity (itch) (Fran-Ko)
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme: Out of control

The Game is not finished. Sorry  : (

You are traveling through space when you got hit by an asteroid. Your guns and maneuvering system start failing, and your ship won’t resist another impact. Try to avoid the asteroid belt that is approaching you.

Controls:

  • W - Move forward.
  • A/S - Rotate.
  • Space-bar - Shoot.
